title: Invincible System: I am the Great Devil - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
author: Nu Shui San Shan   怒水三山
description:
Passing through the alternate world and obtaining the Invincible Great Demon King System by accident would allow one to gain the Devil King's Point as long as they felt resentment and fear, and one could buy everything they wanted from the Demon King's Shop with the Devil King's Point.

From then on, Chu He embarked on the path of a demon king that could become stronger if people hated him. What do you mean by 'Great Universal Dimensional Shift', 'Little Li Flying Dagger', and 'Eight Inner Hidden Gates' are powerful? Sorry, they're just my toys. The invincible Great Demon King Chu He arrived, and all of you kneel down for me … … Kneel!>
